author: linsun
msg: GERONIMO-4139 Add a comment to config-substitutions.properties to indicate its usage - change back to the previous logging for faster logging - the trunk version is using org.slf4j.Logger.

author: ate
msg: Fix incorrect setting of the target contextName of portlet apps when hot deploying from the deploy folder.
The target contextName now needs to be exact as the DeployFactory tool no longer strips off a ".war" postfix.
NB: the DeployMojo already handled this, I forgot to apply the same change for the runtime hotdeploy functionality

author: ddas

msg: HADOOP-3606. Updates the Streaming doc. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.
